response.original_title: Joan Baez released from jail in Oakland
response.overview: KPIX Eyewitness News report from October 26th 1967 in Oakland by Ben Williams, featuring views of Joan Baez and also Ira Sandperl getting off a bus following her release from jail. Includes scenes from an interview with Baez in which she reflects on her arrest in Oakland during the anti-draft week and the relative potential of non violence for social change. (overview from Digital Information Virtual Archive of SFSU)
response.title: Joan Baez released from jail in Oakland
